title: Whitney Port and husband Tim Rosenman keep it casual for coffee run with son Sonny in Los Angeles
text:
Whitney Port and husband Tim Rosenman enjoyed a coffee run Sunday with their son Sonny.

The 34-year-old reality star smiled as her two-year-old son excitedly ran to a cow statue outside the coffee shop.

Whitney kept its casual for the family outing in a grey T-shirt and blue skinny jeans.

Coffee run: Whitney Port and husband Tim Rosenman kept it casual Sunday while out on a coffee run with son Sonny in Los Angeles

She completed her outfit with sandals and red socks.

Whitney had her blonde hair pulled back with a black scrunchie and accessorized with sunglasses.

The Los Angeles native let her natural beauty shine sans makeup.

Tim, 42, kept it simple with a white T-shirt, dark pants and white sneakers.

Cute moment: Sonny sprinted excitedly toward a cow statue outside the coffee shop

Family outing: The Los Angeles native watched as Sonny got close to the cow statue

He sported a thick beard and accessorized with sunglasses.

Sonny wore a grey T-shirt, blue pants and red sneakers.

Whitney and Tim started dating in 2012 and got married in November 2015.

Reality star: The Hills star and Tim have been married since November 2015

They welcomed Sonny in July 2017.

Whitney rose to fame in 2016 after being cast in the MTV reality series The Hills.

She launched her With Whit podcast earlier this year that touches on relationships, parenthood, entrepreneurship, beauty, fashion, health, wellness and more.
description: The 34-year-old reality star and husband Tim Rosenman, 42, enjoyed a coffee run Sunday with their two-year-old son Sonny.
